name: neg11d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: If the difference between two numbers is zero, they are equal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
